civmodern.screen.main.title: Civ Modern Config
civmodern.screen.radar.title: Civ Modern Config (Radar)
civmodern.screen.radar.enabled.tooltip: Whether the radar should be rendered.
civmodern.screen.radar.messages.tooltip: Receive chat messages anytime someone enters or leaves your radar?
civmodern.screen.radar.pings.tooltip: Hear a ping anytime someone enters or leaves your radar?
civmodern.screen.radar.items.tooltip: Show nearby items on your radar?
civmodern.screen.radar.log.tooltip: Allows radar distance to be displayed logarithmically: players nearby will be much more spread out while still maintaining the max distance
civmodern.screen.items.title: Civ Modern Config (Items)
civmodern.screen.items.crates.tooltip: If enabled, crates will have the compacted item colour
civmodern.screen.items.repair.tooltip: If enabled, will show the repair cost of items in their lore
civmodern.screen.ice.title: Civ Modern Config (Ice Road Macro)
civmodern.screen.ice.cardinal.pitch.tool: Should your camera snap its pitch (up/down) when activating the iceroad macro?
civmodern.screen.ice.cardinal.yaw.toolti: Should your camera snap its yaw (left/right) when activating the iceroad macro?
civmodern.screen.ice.stop.tooltip: Automatically stop the ice-road macro when critically hungry?
civmodern.screen.map.title: Civ Modern Config (Map)
civmodern.map.boat.tooltip:
Use while in a boat or riding a steerable animal
Right click to place a navigation waypoint
Shift right click to delete a waypoint
Control right click or dismount to stop
civmodern.map.players.tooltip: Display players that trigger snitches on the map
civmodern.radar.hover:
Click to highlight position
Control click to add waypoint
